Scene.T: [face=Glitch]Hello! You can go to the next message with [controller=A][keyboard=W].
I can also skip it automatically.[wait=1.5][skip]
[]And you can't skip this text! Go on! Try it![wait=2] See?[wait=0.5] Told ya.
[playermove=false][noskip]You can make the player stop moving...[wait=2]
[playermove=true][noskip]...Or allow you to, so the message goes while playing.
I can talk [wait=1][speed=0]really fast [wait=1][speed=0.5]or really slow.
I can also add...[wait=2]uh...[wait=2]Oh![wait=0.5] Right![wait=0.5] Pauses!
I can also [end]end the message abruptly anytime.
[end]Or just show it all from the start.
[face=Bug]There's also a tag for changing the showing face, including pitch!
[face=Glitch]And you don't have to make any sprite references! It is automatically readed with a resource.loadAll().
[face=Bug]But don't worry! If it's called once, it is stored for fast future use, so you there's no performance drop!
[face=None]If you put "none" on the face tag, this is what happens. Ideal for narration!
[face=Glitch][bga=0.35]You can also change the background transparency!
[bga=1][align=right]You can also change...
[align=center]...the text align...
[align=left]...with tags!
So yeah, have fun.
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Welcome to the Glitch World!
[face=Glitch]Uh...I know where we are, Bug. This is where I was born. We were trying to get into the actual game, remember?
[face=Bug]Oh...yeah, yeah, this is just tutorial etiquette.
Just remember you can move [controller=tilting the left stick][keyboard=pressing A and D].
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=0.5]Those little things in front of us are glitch fragments. They're everywhere. Pick them, they will increase your score!
[tutorialArrow=0]You can see how many of them you have in here.
[face=Glitch][tutorialArrow=-1]And what about that strange hexagon?
[face=Bug]Those are special glitch fragments. They're a bit trickier to get, but they're worthy. Your score will increase greatly!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][bga=1]You can jump pressing [controller=A][keyboard=W]. The longer you press, the higher you're going to jump!
[playermove=false][face=Bug][tutorialArrow=3]You may have noticed that we're moving on this slide. This indicates our position on the level.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=2]This are the heroes. If they complete the level before us, we will get a Game Over!
[tutorialArrow=-1]We're in the Glitch World and here time goes slower, so don't worry. We have plenty of it.
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Oh! A door! We probably need a key! We should go back and...
[face=Glitch]Or we could press the [controller=X button][keyboard=space bar] to use our teleport.
I will teleport [controller=in the direction the left stick was pointing at when the button was pressed][keyboard=in the direction of the movement keys you were pressing when it activated].
It ignores any collisions, so I can use it to go through walls, enemies and other solid objects.
[face=Bug]...Yeah, we could do that too.
[speed=0]Party pooper[wait=1.5][skip]
[playermove=false][face=Bug]You can use the teleport while jumping, too. So it's kind of a double jump!
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Uh...Glitch? What are you doing?
[face=Glitch]I just felt a sudden urge for getting in here to see what would happen.
[face=Bug]I...uh...Okay...
[face=Glitch]Don't judge me.
[face=Bug]Oh...no...no...
[face=Glitch]I can feel you judging me!
[face=Bug]W-We should move on!
[playermove=false][face=Bug]Remember that teleportation can go on any direction, including diagonal and downward if you're jumping.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Do you see the exclamation over you head? And the distortion in front of you?
If there's an exclamation over you head, it means that you can bug something on the level pressing [controller=Y][keyboard=shift].
Using this power near this kind of distortions will create platforms!
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=0.5]This is a checkpoint.
[tutorialArrow=4]If you lose a life you will return here. It will also heal you completely upon fist activation.
[tutorialArrow=-1][tutorialArrow=0]If you lose all three lives you will have to spend glitch fragments if you want to return to the last checkpoint.
[tutorialArrow=-1]But don't worry, you won't lose lives in the Glitch World, so keep practicing here until you're confident.
[face=Bug][playermove=false][bga=1]If you see those green particles, that means this wall is climbable.
Just jump to it and, when you're stuck, keep pressing the jump button, no direction needed.
[face=Bug][playermove=false]Those are bouncy artichokes! If you press jump at the right time, you can get really high!
[face=Bug][playermove=false]If you press [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] you will make the game's FPS drop, slowing it down. It will make traps easier to avoid!
You can deactivate it whenever you want by pressing [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] again.
[tutorialArrow=1]But be careful, it doesn't last forever! This bar shows how many time left you have.
The bar will start filling itself once the power is deactivated, so don't worry about that.
[tutorialArrow=-1]Let's try it in this smashy-crushy things!
[face=None][playermove=false]¡Bienvenido al reino alcachofa!
Puedes moverte [controller=inclinando el stick izquierdo][keyboard=pulsando A y D].
También puedes saltar pulsando [controller=A][keyboard=W]. ¡Cuanto más tiempo lo mantengas pulsado, más alto llegarás!
[face=None][playermove=false]Pulsa [controller=el botón X][keyboard=la barra espaciadora] para usar tu teletransporte.
Te desplazarás [controller=en la dirección a la que apuntaba el joystick izquierdo][keyboard=en la dirección de las teclas de movimiento] cuando lo activaste.
Ignora colisiones, así que puedes atravesar paredes, enemigos u otros objetos sólidos.
Puede usarse en el suelo o tras saltar...¡Así que vale como doble salto!
Si quieres probarlo, trata de hacerte con los objetos sobre este árbol.
[face=None][playermove=false]¿Ves el símbolo de exclamación sobre tu cabeza? ¿Y la distorsión frente a ti?
Si hay un símbolo de exclamación sobre tu cabeza significa que puedes buggear algo del nivel pulsando [controller=Y][keyboard=shift].
Si lo usas con este tipo de distorsiones...¡Crearás plataformas!
[face=None][playermove=false]¡Hey! ¿Eso de ahí son trampas? Quizá necesites ralentizar el tiempo para salirte de esta.
Si pulsas [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] harás que los FPS del juego bajen, ralentizándolo. ¡Así estará chupado!
Puedes desactivarlo cuando quieras pulsando [controller=B][keyboard=CTRL] de nuevo.
¡Pero cuidado, que no dura para siempre! Fíjate en la barra bajo tus vidas. Te indica cuánto tiempo te queda.
No te preocupes, la barra se irá rellenando sola cuando mientras el poder esté inactivo.
